title: hack
body:
some one hack my account i don't know how and he play ranked and he do afk to me and i forgot my email because i make this account before 4 years this my new account if some one can help me plz help me 
-snip-

replies.body: I've removed your account details for privacy.  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which will submit a ticket to our account team.  We'll respond as soon as possible and help out!
